item.title: By: darnold23
item.dc:creator: darnold23
item.description: I sometimes crave French onion soup. It's just a traditional favorite of ours...yours looks terrific. Thanks for sharing it. I would love for you to join me for Crock Pot Wednesday. Mister Linky is up and waiting for you to post a favorite.
item.content:encoded: I sometimes crave French onion soup. It’s just a traditional favorite of ours…yours looks terrific. Thanks for sharing it. I would love for you to join me for Crock Pot Wednesday. Mister Linky is up and waiting for you to post a favorite.

item.title: By: Rilsta
item.dc:creator: Rilsta
item.description: This looks so yummy! Did you make it to use up all those onions from your previous post?! :)
item.content:encoded: This looks so yummy! Did you make it to use up all those onions from your previous post?! ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: Julia @ MÃ©langer
item.dc:creator: Julia @ MÃ©langer
item.description: I have been afflicted with a sore head, chest and throat. Oh, and laryngitis! This would just be the most perfect thing to eat. Could almost rival chicken soup when you're feeling a bit under the weather!
item.content:encoded: I have been afflicted with a sore head, chest and throat. Oh, and laryngitis! This would just be the most perfect thing to eat. Could almost rival chicken soup when you’re feeling a bit under the weather!

item.title: By: Southern Grace gourmet
item.dc:creator: Southern Grace gourmet
item.description: That looks delicious, I still haven't made this at home, but its on my list!
item.content:encoded: That looks delicious, I still haven’t made this at home, but its on my list!

item.title: By: Lorraine @NotQuiteNigella
item.dc:creator: Lorraine @NotQuiteNigella
item.description: French Onion Soup is one of my favourite soups too! And I love it that onions are good for you. If only I could figure out a foolproof way of cutting onions without crying!
item.content:encoded: French Onion Soup is one of my favourite soups too! And I love it that onions are good for you. If only I could figure out a foolproof way of cutting onions without crying!

item.title: By: Maria@TheGourmetChallenge
item.dc:creator: Maria@TheGourmetChallenge
item.description: hmmm cheesy croutons, is there anything better in the world. They are so well accompanied by the french onion soup...oh wait isn't it the other way around?
item.content:encoded: hmmm cheesy croutons, is there anything better in the world. They are so well accompanied by the french onion soup…oh wait isn’t it the other way around?

item.title: By: Barbara
item.dc:creator: Barbara
item.description: I love onion soup but have never figured out whether it's only because I especially love the toasted cheesy topping!
item.content:encoded: I love onion soup but have never figured out whether it’s only because I especially love the toasted cheesy topping!

item.title: By: Anh
item.dc:creator: Anh
item.description: Onion soup, yum!! I love it but the thought of peeling and chopping all the onion sort of scares me out :P
item.content:encoded: Onion soup, yum!! I love it but the thought of peeling and chopping all the onion sort of scares me out ðŸ˜›

item.title: By: Arwen from Hoglet K
item.dc:creator: Arwen from Hoglet K
item.description: It's good to have a sale to back up your deadline - I always have trouble sticking to them. The soup looks good, especially with the cheese toast on top.
item.content:encoded: It’s good to have a sale to back up your deadline – I always have trouble sticking to them. The soup looks good, especially with the cheese toast on top.

item.title: By: Steph
item.dc:creator: Steph
item.description: Mmm french onion soup is so great, and this looks just right! Looks like you're making good use of that huge bag on onions :)
item.content:encoded: Mmm french onion soup is so great, and this looks just right! Looks like you’re making good use of that huge bag on onions ðŸ™‚
